metadata.title: CVE-2021-23413 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: This affects the package jszip before 3.7.0. Crafting a new zip file withfilenames set to Object prototype values (e.g __proto__, toString, etc)results in a returned object with a modified prototype instance.

criterions.comment: node-jszip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
